member.name: T:Roblox.Coordination.IBackgroundWorker
member.summary: An object implementing this interface will perform work in the background. The Start() and Stop() are using to control that work-flow.

member.name: P:Roblox.Coordination.IBackgroundWorker.IsRunning
member.summary: Has the Start() method been called without the Stop() method being called?

member.name: E:Roblox.Coordination.IBackgroundWorker.Started
member.summary: The background thread has started doing work.

member.name: E:Roblox.Coordination.IBackgroundWorker.Stopped
member.summary: The background thread has completed work.

member.name: E:Roblox.Coordination.IBackgroundWorker.Worked
member.summary: The worker is running and DoWork has completed.

member.name: E:Roblox.Coordination.IBackgroundWorker.Working
member.summary: The worker is running and DoWork is about to be called.
